Paragraph: The purpose of the present study was to determine whether chronic administration of temocapril , a long - acting non - SH group angiotensin converting enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor , reduced proteinuria , inhibited glomerular hypertrophy and prevented glomerulosclerosis in chronic puromycin aminonucleoside ( PAN ) - induced nephrotic rats .

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The purpose of the present study was to determine whether chronic administration of temocapril , a long - acting non - SH group angiotensin converting enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor , reduced proteinuria , inhibited glomerular hypertrophy and prevented glomerulosclerosis in chronic puromycin aminonucleoside ( PAN ) - induced nephrotic rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| temocapril |
| long-acting non-SH group angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor |
| chronic puromycin aminonucleoside (PAN) |
| puromycin aminonucleotide (the active metabolite of puromycin aminonucleoside) |
| angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) |
| SH group (sulfhydryl group) |
| glomerulosclerosis |
| proteinuria |

Note: Glomerulosclerosis and proteinuria are not chemicals but conditions or outcomes. However, they are often associated with specific chemical causes or markers, so they are included for completeness.

| --- |
| temocapril |

| puromycin aminonucleoside (PAN) |
| angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) |

Note: Proteinuria and glomerulosclerosis are not chemicals, but conditions or outcomes. They are not mentioned as specific chemicals in the paragraph.
